content: here is a sixth and last little amigurumi marine animal in this series a blue chromis fish it can be stitched up in less than an hour when stitched with worsted weight yarn and a 4mm hook it comes to 4 5 inches long 2 5 inches tall and just under 1 inch thick with stuffing it is part of a series of sea life animals that i am creating for a baby mobile other animals include - sea life - octopus /patterns/library/sea-life---octopus - sea life - squid /patterns/library/sea-life---squid - sea life - yellow tang /patterns/library/sea-life---yellow-tang - sea life - jellies /patterns/library/sea-life---jellies - sea life - ochre sea star /patterns/library/sea-life---ochre-sea-star
